title: Veganz - Schivelbeiner Strasse
description: Established Jul 2011, this is a vegan supermarket that features hard-to-find vegan delicacies, bulk items, and much more. Hosts lectures about the vegan diet and raw diet. On premises is a cafe, bistro, bakery and delicatessen where vegans, raw foodists, allergy sensitive, and healthy eaters will dine on plant-based and raw treats, both sweet and savory.
